amendment.description: To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Army, up to $8,000,000 for the Advanced Tank Armament System.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4789 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4789 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Stabenow. (consideration: CR S8674-8675; text: CR S8674-8675) To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Army, up to $8,000,000 for the Advanced Tank Armament System.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4789 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4789 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Stabenow.
